[Strategic Partnerships Manager (iGaming Influencer/Affiliate) - Hybrid Miami](/careers/strategic-partnerships-manager-igaming-influencer-affiliate-hybrid-miami-north-america-38153-28764)
Sliema, North America
$95,000 - 100,000 + attractive bonus + benefits
My client are seeking a Strategic Partnership Manager (Influencer/Affiliate) to oversee and execute influencer marketing campaigns aimed at expanding our acquisition network and strengthening partnerships with operating partners. This role is responsible for developing, implementing, and evaluating campaigns that harness influencer and strategic third-party partnerships. The Strategic Partnership Manager will optimize current relationships, identify suitable partners, negotiate beneficial deals, and ensure campaign success through analysis and strategic adjustments. The manager also tracks and analyzes campaign success, adjusts strategies as needed, and reports back to senior management. Staying up to date with the latest trends and best practices is crucial to ensure campaigns are effective and innovative. Key Responsibilities Develop and execute influencer marketing strategies aligned with overall marketing objectives. Regularly liaise and collaborate with Commercial, Ad Ops, and Revenue Ops teams. Identify and engage influencers whose audience and values align with the brand. Manage the end-to-end execution of influencer campaigns, including timeline management, account management for third-party partners, performance tracking, and post-campaign analysis. Provide regular reports on campaign performance, including metrics such as engagement, reach, and ROI. Collaborate with cross-functional teams (e.g., social media, creative, PR) to ensure cohesive campaign execution. Stay abreast of industry trends and best practices in influencer marketing to innovate and enhance campaign effectiveness. Monitor campaign budgets and ensure efficient allocation of resources. Conduct market research and analysis to identify emerging trends and influencers relevant to target demographics. Provide guidance and support to internal teams and external partners on best practices and strategies for leveraging influencer partnerships effectively. Continuously optimize campaign performance through A/B testing, audience segmentation, and creative experimentation. Stay informed about legal regulations and industry guidelines related to influencer marketing and ensure all campaigns adhere to compliance requirements. Requirements Bachelor‚Äôs degree in business, finance, marketing, or a related field; Master‚Äôs degree preferred. 2‚Äì3 years of account management experience. Proven experience in account management, preferably in the US-regulated online gambling industry. Previous experience in social media marketing and understanding of acquisition and monetization via social media is a plus. Demonstrated ability to drive results and achieve business objectives through strategic thinking, data-driven decision-making, and effective execution. Strong business acumen and a track record of delivering measurable outcomes in a dynamic and competitive environment. Experience working with cross-functional teams and in a matrix organizational structure is an advantage. Solid understanding of financial management principles, including budgeting, forecasting, and P&L analysis. Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with stakeholders at all levels. Ability to work flexible hours several times a week and/or as needed Working Conditions This position is 100% remote in Miami initially, transitioning to a hybrid model once the Miami hub is operational. Must be available during regular business hours, with occasional evening and weekend work as required. Requires a stable, high-speed internet connection and working cellular telephone. Must be able to perform indoor work with minimal noise, independently or as part of a team. Ability to plan and direct work activities, follow written and oral instructions, and communicate information clearly. Must demonstrate professionalism, discretion, and the ability to handle multiple, simultaneous, and changing priorities. Must be capable of exercising the highest level of discretion on both internal and external confidential matters. Physical Requirements Primarily sedentary work with limited physical exertion. Ability to work on a computer for an average of 8 hours per day. Occasional evening and weekend work may be required. Must be capable of travel by automobile, commercial airlines, rental vehicles, and public transportation, and able to lodge in public facilities as needed. Regular, reliable, and timely attendance is required.
[Apply now](/careers/strategic-partnerships-manager-igaming-influencer-affiliate-hybrid-miami-north-america-38153-28764)
On-site
[System Admin - MacOs - iGaming - Onsite NJ](/careers/system-admin-macos-igaming-onsite-nj-north-america-38152-28763)
Bulgaria, North America
$80-120k + benefits
My client is seeking a talented System Administrator to join a growing team in Fort Lee, New Jersey. If you‚Äôre passionate about IT support, thrive in a fast-paced environment, and want to be part of the dynamic iGaming sector, we want to hear from you. The System Admin is to provide timely and effective technical support to the team in the new office in New Jersey. The candidate will be responsible for diagnosing, troubleshooting, and resolving hardware, software, and network-related issues. This role is key to maintaining operational excellence across all IT support services and ensuring a smooth and productive experience for internal users. Responsibilities: Provide first-line and second-line technical support for internal users via Jira Service Desk, in person, or through corporate messenger (Slack). Diagnose and resolve issues related to hardware, software, peripherals, network access, and operating systems (mostly MacOS). Configure and install laptops, desktop systems, printers, mobile devices, CCTV, ACS, meeting rooms and other IT equipment. Maintain daily health of IT systems, including updates, patches, and performance checks. Document incidents, resolutions, and knowledge base articles for internal use (Confluence). Maintain inventory and lifecycle management of IT assets (Jira Assets). Manage and troubleshoot Local Area Networks (LAN), Wi-Fi networks, and VPN access (Paloalto). Assist with Onboarding and Offboarding (including providing IT-equipment, accesses, setting up systems, configure VPN, security software etc). Set up workstations for new employees, including email, system access. Assist with audio/video and conferencing equipment, including meeting room and media classes setups. Ensure follow-up with users to confirm issue resolution and collect feedback. Contribute to continuous improvement of support processes and user satisfaction. Collaborate with other IT teams for escalation and cross-functional troubleshooting when needed. Requirements: Minimum 3 years of experience in a technical support or system administration role. Proficiency with macOS systems (Windows will be a plus). Ability to diagnose and resolve basic technical issues independently. Strong knowledge of IT support tools and ticketing systems (e.g., Jira). Excellent oral and written communication skills in English (Any others will be a plus). Ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment. Service-oriented mindset with a focus on user experience and reliability. Plus points for: Experience working in a service desk environment with SLA-based response times. Familiarity with MDM systems for managing Apple devices (e.g., Jamf). Hands-on experience with MikroTik and Ubiquiti network devices. Knowledge of CCTV and access control systems. Experience supporting AV/meeting room equipment (Logitech, Crestron, etc.). Basic scripting (PowerShell, Bash) or automation skills for desktop provisioning. Understanding of ITIL or similar IT service management frameworks. Why Join? Be part of a fast-growing company in the exciting iGaming sector. Opportunity to work with an international and diverse team. Support career growth and continuous learning. Competitive salary and benefits package. Core Benefits: Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance Life and Disability Insurance 401(k) Retirement Savings Plan with company match Generous Paid Time Off, including holidays and personal days Annual and KPI-based Bonuses - performance-driven bonuses are available based on personal and company achievements Additional Programs: Employee Assistance Program (EAP) Wellness initiatives and voluntary insurance options Professional development and training opportunities Office Perks: Collaborative, team-oriented environment Regular team-building activities and company events Stocked snacks, coffee, and beverages
[Apply now](/careers/system-admin-macos-igaming-onsite-nj-north-america-38152-28763)
On-site
[VIP Manager - iGaming/Sweepstakes - Onsite in Vancouver](/careers/vip-manager-igaming-sweepstakes-onsite-in-vancouver-north-america-38146-28762)
Vancouver , North America
DOE
As a VIP Host Account Manager, you‚Äôll be responsible for managing relationships with high-value players, enhancing engagement, satisfaction, and loyalty by delivering a personalized and premium experience. You‚Äôll proactively reach out to VIPs, offer exclusive promotions, and provide exceptional service to maximize player retention and lifetime value. This role may require availability during evenings and weekends, depending on business needs. Key Responsibilities: Build Relationships: Develop and maintain strong, trusted connections with VIP players to drive engagement and long-term loyalty. Dedicated Support: Serve as the main point of contact for high-value players, ensuring personalized and timely communication via email, chat, phone, and social platforms. VIP Promotions: Design and execute tailored VIP promotions, offers, and engagement strategies based on player preferences. Player Insights: Monitor player activity, analyze trends, and identify opportunities to enhance the VIP experience. Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with Marketing, CRM, and Product teams to align VIP initiatives with broader business goals. Event Planning: Plan and coordinate exclusive VIP events (virtual and in-app) to reward and engage top players. Feedback & Improvement: Collect and relay player feedback to inform product improvements and promotional strategies. Compliance: Ensure adherence to responsible gaming policies and company guidelines. Record Keeping: Maintain accurate records of player interactions, preferences, and engagement history. Requirements: Experience: 3+ years in VIP account management, customer service, or a related role in gaming, hospitality, or entertainment. Customer-First Mindset: Strong relationship-building and communication skills. Industry Knowledge: Experience in social casino, iGaming, or online gaming preferred. Analytical Skills: Ability to assess player behavior, trends, and engagement data. Multi-Tasking: Comfortable working in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. Organization: High level of organization and attention to detail. Tech Savvy: Proficiency in CRM tools and player tracking systems. Budget Management: Knowledge of maintaining a promotional budget and customer reinvestment guidelines. Flexibility: Willingness to work non-traditional hours, including evenings and weekends, to support player needs.

# Welcome to Training for Employment
#### A not-for-profit community interest Company.
[ Learn More ](https://trainingforemployment.co.uk/#AboutusHP)
[ Contact Us ](https://trainingforemployment.co.uk/contact)
### FINANCIAL FORECASTING
Ensure you have the vital knowledge in place before you take the plunge and start up. Take charge of your future and book onto a free workshop today.
### LEGAL
### MATTERS
A Self-Employment workshop from TfE lets you take positive action for your future, and costs you nothing but some of your time.
### BUSINESS
### PLANNING
A Self-Employment workshop from TfE allows you to take charge of your future at no charge to you. Make sure you have the vital knowledge in place before you take the plunge and start up.
### SOCIAL
### IMPACT
TfE has given potential entrepreneurs the confidence to enter the business world and become catalysts for local economic growth and social mobility
quotesArtboard 1 copy 2
### Training for Employment, or ‚ÄòTfE‚Äô to its friends, partners and stakeholders, is a not-for-profit Community Interest Company (C.I.C.) based in Selby, North Yorkshire, United Kingdom.
###
### TfE was first established in 2011, as a Limited Liability Partnership. Now a CIC social enterprise, it has an excellent track record in assisting individuals to learn about all the main aspects of self-employment.
###
### Learners can attend 1:1 or small group remote learning sessions (e.g. via Zoom or MS Teams) to learn about:
### ‚Ä¢ Business Planning
### ‚Ä¢ Pricing
### ‚Ä¢ Marketing
### ‚Ä¢ Budgeting and Cashflow
### ‚Ä¢ Tax and Self-Assessment
###
### To book a place on the next session about self employment, please get in touch.
###
[ Get in Touch ](https://trainingforemployment.co.uk/contact)
##### CONTACT US
Training for Employment improving the trajectory of learner's skills via friendly small group workshops which increase employability, self-employment, business and seeking a new job.

scraped_results.title: Alexander Real Estate
scraped_results.markdown_content:
# Alexander Real Estate
We set our focus on providing high quality, reliable and affordable commercial and residential properties in our core area of North West England and Wales. We are also diversifying into providing holiday lets throughout Europe which provides the same excellent standard of service.
We ARE the business to trust, we ARE the most committed among our competitors, we ARE the Landlord of choice and most importantly we ARE passionate about what we do.
## Our Mission
To reinvent the term ‚Äòsupport‚Äô by providing an attentive and individualised approach to property.
We are dedicated for catering for the ‚Äòevery person‚Äô, whether it is renting your new home, kick-starting your dream career or booking a holiday hassle-free. We provide a specialised service and ensure the venture is right for you.
## Our Tenants
We put both our Tenants and Customers first and at the centre of our business strategy which is why customers prefer to rent, let and work with us. We are a family run business which means we are committed, friendly and are devoted to delivering a great service with added value.
Alexander Real Estate will support and guide you through the whole process, making it a straightforward and most importantly a pleasurable experience.
## Why we are different
We ensure that Tenants get the best service and know that we care. Our dedicated maintenance team know our properties inside out and have a long working history with us, so are trusted to carry out repairs at your convenience.
We do quarterly inspections to ensure Tenants are not only safe but also to help us improve. Furthermore, we are members of Rent Smart Wales and are proud to be a part of the Residential Landlords association, one of the leading UK‚Äôs leading Landlord association.
## Our Partners

[Home](https://qualitypi.co.uk/) ¬ª About
**We are QPI, an independently owned, specialist Broking and Risk Management Company providing insurance solutions to professionals.**
Why not benefit from the services of a trusted independent risk management adviser? As Professional Service providers you face your own unique set of challenges and associated risks.
Regardless of the size or breadth of your practice, professional services businesses operate in increasingly challenging conditions. As professionals your work involves a great deal of responsibility, which comes with significant levels of potential exposure, especially in this increasingly litigious time.
Our experience, dedicated account management, access to a wide range of insurers and our enhanced risk profiling ensures cost-effective insurance designed around your business.
EXPERT ADVICE IS ONLY A CALL AWAY ‚Äì 0203 376 0990
### OUR SPECIALIST TEAM
Specialist team of risk management, legal and insurance professionals
### TAILORMADE
Tailor made policies to all practices
### DEDICATED ACCOUNT MANAGER
Your primary point of contact
### CLAIMS & CRISIS MANAGEMENT
Quality built on experience
### INDEPENDENTADVICE
Independent advice on your insurance, risk and funding matters
### SPECIALIST KNOWLEDGE IN NEW START FIRMS
Specialist knowledge in New Start law firms

Most of all he cares and I can categorically say in distressed commercial times Simon has saved the day. I can highly recommend him.‚Äù

HLP Legal Ltd t/a 174 Family Law
‚ÄúI can‚Äôt speak highly enough about Gillian Anderson and the invaluable support she has provided to our business. Her extensive knowledge and practical knowhow were instrumental in securing an excellent insurance policy in a difficult insurance market.
### Paul Clark
Spall Clark Solicitors
‚ÄúAs a firm we‚Äôd got into the habit of renewing our PI with the same broker, as it felt that was the easiest option, but from the first conversation with Gillian at Quality PI I knew that it was time to change. Gillian and Phil are very personable and have gone out of their way to ensure that we are fully equipped with all the information we need and are on hand for any queries, large or small‚Äù

DF Legal LLP

She has taken time to understand our business model and has supported us for many years in obtaining competitive quotes for us in all our dealing with her. We have every confidence in her service and she has demonstrated exceptional commitment and knowledge of the industry‚Äù

Teelan & Silwal Family Law Ltd

Steve Cornforth Consultancy

She goes above and beyond other brokers we have dealt with over the years, and I recommend their services to everyone I know. A customer care focused driven broker who never fails to get me the best quote for renewal‚Äù
### Maya Nisa-Zaman
MZ Law Solicitors Ltd
‚ÄúI have used Simon Ong and QPI‚Äôs services for a number of years. During this time, I have never had an issue with their service and find Simon, Phil and the team to be consummate approachable professionals, with a wealth of knowledge in the insurance and risk mitigation field. They have always been competitively priced and give access to the top tier legal insurance companies. I would highly recommend QPI to anyone in the legal sector.‚Äù

__0203 376 0990

[Home](https://qualitypi.co.uk/) ¬ª Contact Us
## For expert advice contact our team
### Phil Edwards
Managing Director
**Landline:** 01604 609900 (Northampton)
**Mobile:** 07519 128332
[phil.edwards@qualitypi.co.uk](mailto:phil.edwards@qualitypi.co.uk)
* [](https://www.linkedin.com/in/phil-edwards-87351b28/)
Read More
### Phil Edwards
Phil Edwards has acquired more than 40 years of experience in Corporate Insurance, Risk Management, and Claims Management and Analysis, and held several senior management roles within the corporate and professions broking sectors during his extensive career. His career has included such diverse roles as acting as an outsourced Risk and Insurance Manager to a Global Manufacturing company to being Managing Director of a Protected Cell in a Captive Insurer. Latterly as Managing Director of QPI Legal Ltd ‚Äì Specialist Niche Broker Dealing Primarily with Solicitors Professional Indemnity with a Risk Management Bias. Specialising in the Risk and Claims Management and Analysis elements as well as Alternative Risk Financing and Captive Insurance, his specialist knowledge of how Risk Management influences insurance buying is significant. As Managing Director of the QPI brand, Phil led the sale and integration of the business into a prominent national consolidator broker. He subsequently took on roles including National Lead for the Professions Team, National Lead for Cyber Product Development, a key resource for ART/Captive Insurance expertise, and a national resource for Financial Lines Claims Management. Educationally, Phil has a Batchelor of Science degree in applied biochemistry and has qualified both as an Associate of the Chartered Insurance Institute and as a Chartered Member of the Institute of Risk Management. He holds the designation Chartered Insurance Risk Manager.
### Simon Ong
Director
**Landline:** 01772 509494 (Preston)
**Mobile:** 07842 313626
[simon.ong@qualitypi.co.uk](mailto:simon.ong@qualitypi.co.uk)
* [](https://www.linkedin.com/in/simon-ong-3a362820/)
Read More
### Simon Ong
Simon brings over 24 years of expertise in the insurance broking sector, with a focus on Solicitors‚Äô Professional Indemnity and General Insurance, including Cyber Liability, Management Liability, and Office Insurance. He has gained experience working with AON, Wesleyan, and PIB before becoming a Director at QPI Limited in 2021. Simon excels at supporting firms of all sizes, distinguishing himself from many of his peers through his dedication and genuine care for his clients. Outside of work, Simon enjoys tackling DIY projects, creating cherished moments with his family, and whenever possible, playing a round of golf (though not always with the best results!).
### Gillian Anderson
Director
**Landline:** 0151 351 6555 (Liverpool)
**Mobile:** 07874 867615
[gillian.anderson@qualitypi.co.uk](mailto:gillian.anderson@qualitypi.co.uk)
* [](https://www.linkedin.com/in/gillian-anderson-a1400660/)
Read More
### Gillian Anderson
Gillian has over 30 year‚Äôs experience in underwriting and broking, working with independent and global, listed organisations. Focusing on Professional Indemnity, Directors & Officers, Employment Practices, Cyber and Crime particularly for regulated professions. Enjoys travel, her family and their dog Maggie and uses her leisure time to pursue outdoor activities including skiing and rowing.
### Hayley Dawson
Professions Account Director
**Mobile:** 07955 270487
[hayley.dawson@qualitypi.co.uk](mailto:hayley.dawson@qualitypi.co.uk)
* [](https://www.linkedin.com/in/hayley-dawson-cert-cii-68288340/)
Read More
### Hayley Dawson
Hayley has been in the insurance industry for over 30 years, beginning her career as an Assistant Underwriter at Royal Insurance and then going on to specialise in Professional Indemnity. Hayley‚Äôs focus is on the Financial Services, Construction and Health tech sectors where she helps her clients with PI, Management Liability and Cyber Liability. ‚ÄúWhat drives me is delivering an exceptional level of service and advice to my clients and being there for them when they need help with finding a solution to an issue.‚Äù Outside of insurance, Hayley can be found in the County of Rutland being taken for a walk by her German Pointer, or out for a run around the reservoir!
### Jon Cook
Director
**Landline:** 0121 312 3999 (Birmingham)
**Mobile:** 07736 793991
[jon.cook@qualitypi.co.uk](mailto:jon.cook@qualitypi.co.uk)
* [](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jonathan-cook-a89068272/)
Read More
### Jon Cook
Jon is an FCII-qualified insurance professional with over 44 years of experience in the risk and insurance sector. His career has included working with PE-backed businesses, insurers, and the legal sector, where he has provided consulting services on M&A, compliance, and AML matters. Between 2010 and 2018, Jon was instrumental in establishing two solicitor insurers, and earlier in his career, he founded a household-name insurance broker group. Today, Jon balances his client work with the development of innovative business relationships and products, ensuring his expertise remains at the forefront of industry needs. Outside of his primary role, Jon is involved with businesses in the legal sector, including a TPA specializing in client money handling and another advising and raising VC capital for tech startups. A legacy of legal and public service runs in Jon‚Äôs family: his daughter is a senior partner at a large law firm, and his father served as chairman of the magistrates‚Äô bench in Jon‚Äôs hometown. Beyond work, Jon enjoys road cycling, Land Rovers, restoring old lawnmowers, and supporting his local Premier League football team.
### Claire Wills
Director
**Landline:** 01536 211888 (Lincoln)
**Mobile:** 07706 318452
[claire.wills@qualitypi.co.uk](mailto:claire.wills@qualitypi.co.uk)
* [](https://www.linkedin.com/in/claire-wills-98b67518/)
Read More
### Claire Wills
Claire is an extremely experienced insurance broker, having been in the profession for over 30 years. For the last 20 years she has specialised in dealing with Solicitors Professional Indemnity Insurance, initially as a key team member within QPI Legal Ltd and latterly with Towergate Brokers before joining the Quality PI team as a Director. During this period she has built an enviable reputation with insurers as a knowledgeable, inciteful and effective broker. With her clients she is renowned as someone who cares about them and their business and who represents them effectively, with expertise when discussing and negotiating cover on their behalf. Her attention to detail and willingness to ‚Äògo the extra mile‚Äô for firms of all sizes sets her apart from many of her peers. Outside of work Claire likes nothing more than relaxing by taking her two dogs for long walks in the countryside around her home, usually very early in the morning and in all types of weather!
### Laura Potter
Account Broker
Mobile: 07743 963149
Email: [laura.potter@qualitypi.co.uk](mailto:laura.potter@qualitypi.co.uk)
* [](https://www.linkedin.com/in/laura-potter-a6400a10a/)
### Lisa Summerton
Business Development Director
**Mobile:** 07548 845870
[lisa.summerton@qualitypi.co.uk](mailto:lisa.summerton@qualitypi.co.uk)
* [](https://www.linkedin.com/in/lisasummerton/)
Read More
### Lisa Summerton
Lisa is legally trained and worked as a conveyancer in a number of established law firms and therefore has an inate understanding of the mechanics of how law firms are run and operate, and the intricacies of client work along with the standards that are required to ensure best practice. She transitioned to senior roles including C suite positions in established legal sector service provider businesses where she gained experience in IT, strategic, and operational aspects of the legal sector. She has travelled across the UK extensively and met with a large proportion of legal practices in England and Wales, and has a well honed ability to add value to firms via her extensive contact base and connections in the sector. With a passion for demonstrating how technology can reduce risk, Lisa eventually entered the insurance sector, where she has worked closely with brokers and insurers to educate them on innovative software solutions that help law firms manage risk effectively. As Business Development Director at QPi, Lisa combines her expertise in professional industries with a strong focus on client satisfaction. Her dedication to delivering value at every opportunity ensures that client expectations are met while collaborating with the QPi team to provide exceptional service. scraped_results.markdown_content:

Home[admin](https://monkeypuzzleastwick.co.uk/author/admin/ "Posts by admin")2025-10-31T11:21:04+00:00
toddlers home

# Play, learn and grow
with Monkey Puzzle
toddlers home
[](https://monkeypuzzleastwick.co.uk/enquire-now/)
## Enquire now for a personal tour of our nursery
____
toddlers home
toddlers home
toddlers home
Play, learn and grow
with Monkey Puzzle
toddlers home
## Welcome to Monkey Puzzle
Hello. I‚Äôm Natasha and I am the owner of Monkey Puzzle Astwick. My passion, which runs throughout our nursery, is to give children access to the environment so that every child has the chance to learn through outside adventures, as every child deserves the chance to fly a kite or jump in a stream. [My team](https://monkeypuzzleastwick.co.uk/meet-the-team/) and I are dedicated to giving every child the best start in life by caring for and supporting them to play, learn and grow in a positive and [stimulating environment](https://monkeypuzzleastwick.co.uk/environment/).
I would love to welcome and show you around our beautiful nursery setting so please get in touch.
Natasha
**Nursery Owner**
## Enjoy our virtual tour
## What Makes Us Special
## Award-Winning Care
We‚Äôre proud to be recognised among the Top 20 Day Nurseries in the region, a reflection of our team‚Äôs passion and dedication. With glowing 5-star reviews from parents, we deliver exceptional care and education every day. Our staff go above and beyond to create a nurturing environment where every child feels seen, heard, and loved. We celebrate each child‚Äôs individuality, guiding them through their early years with warmth and expertise. Our strong relationships with families and children are what make our nursery truly special.
[Find Out More](https://monkeypuzzleastwick.co.uk/care/)
## Forest School Magic
Our Forest School sessions bring learning to life through the wonder of nature. Set in the countryside, children enjoy outdoor adventures like climbing trees, making mud pies, and cooking over campfires. These hands-on experiences help build independence, resilience, and teamwork from an early age. Led by our qualified Forest School Leader, sessions are child-led and rooted in curiosity and creativity. We believe that learning doesn‚Äôt have to happen inside four walls. Nature offers endless opportunities to grow, explore, and have fun every day.
[Find Out More](https://monkeypuzzleastwick.co.uk/forest-school/)
## Home-from-Home Environment
Our nursery is designed to feel like a second home‚Äîwarm, welcoming, and filled with love. Each room is tailored to the needs of its age group, creating safe and stimulating spaces where children feel truly nurtured. With cosy corners, free-flow gardens, and thoughtfully chosen resources, we support children in building confidence and emotional security. Our team works hard to create a peaceful, consistent environment that feels familiar and comforting. Children are supported at every stage, developing independence and strong foundations for life.
[Find Out More](https://monkeypuzzleastwick.co.uk/environment/)
## Fantastic Outdoor Space
At Monkey Puzzle Astwick, children thrive in a stunning countryside setting with daily access to nature, animals, and fresh air. Our converted barn nursery offers open space and freedom for little explorers to learn through adventure. Whether it‚Äôs picking fruit, building dens, or saying hello to farm animals, the outdoors is at the heart of what we do. We believe real-life experiences help children grow into curious, confident learners. Our passionate team encourages outdoor discovery in all weather, sparking joy and imagination every single day.
[Find Out More](https://monkeypuzzleastwick.co.uk/curriculum/)
## Social Development
Childcare offers more than financial benefits. It‚Äôs a gateway for children to build relationships, develop social skills, make friends, and enjoy diverse learning experiences. This prepares them not just for school but also for life. We are part of the local community groups, building relationships with other local businesses, schools and baby groups.
## High-Quality Early Education
Access to funded childcare ensures children benefit from professional early years educators. Nurseries like Monkey Puzzle focus on creating enriching environments where children can play, learn, and grow. Combined with the Early Years Foundation Stage (EYFS) framework, this ensures children are set up for a confident start to their education journeys.
## Enhanced Work-Life Balance
More affordable childcare means parents can take on more working hours or even return to work. This creates opportunities for career growth free from the worry of excessive childcare costs.
## Reduced Nursery Fees
For working parents, nursery fees often represent a significant part of household expenses. That‚Äôs why we are committed to providing a nurturing, home-like environment where your children reach milestones with care and support.
With 30 hours funded childcare, families can save an average of ¬£7,500 per year per child. This allows parents to re-prioritise other important aspects of their lives, such as savings or home improvements.
## Parent and Carer Reviews
From our Daynurseries.co.uk reviews, find out what our parents have to say about their time at our Monkey Puzzle Day Nursery and Preschool in Astwick.
Hear what our parents and carers have to say about our Monkey Puzzle Day Nursery and Preschool in Astwick with a selection of reviews from Daynurseries.co.uk.
## A Day In Our Nursery
## Healthy Eating
As children grow, a healthy and balanced diet is key, and we inspire with a variety of colour, texture, and taste to expand their food experiences.
Seasonal and local produce are also important in helping children understand more about where food comes from and nutrition.
[Explore Example Menu](https://monkeypuzzleastwick.co.uk/nutrition/)
## All The Essentials
Monkey Puzzle Astwick key information at a glance.
* __
Learning guided by the national Early Years Foundation Stage
*  __
An amazing home-from-home environment
*  __
Daily extracurricular activities, all included in our fees
* __
Branded nappies and creams included
*  __
Fantastic all-seasons outdoor play area
*  __
Inspiring, caring and highly qualified team
*  __
Open 51 weeks of the year
## Exciting Days
It‚Äôs smiles all round with fun and inspiring days with child centred activities supported, guided, and encouraged by our passionate team.

## Enquire now for a personal tour of our nursery
____
## How To Find Monkey Puzzle Astwick
Monkey Puzzle Astwick is situated at Church Farm in the Hamlet of Astwick, next door to the historic church of St Guthlac. We are located on Astwick Road, which is short distance from the centre of Stotfold or the A1M. We are located less than 3 miles away from Arlesey Train Station and about 4 ¬Ω miles away from Letchworth Train station with buses running near-by every 30 minutes during peak times.
When arriving at Church Farm (on the bend of Astwick Road, near a bridge that crosses the River Ivel), drive through the double gates and follow the drive to the end. Visitor parking is found in the left hand side car park. Once parked, the nursery is directly opposite the car park, over a small bridge and to the left. Ring the door bell when you arrive and one of our team will greet you.
## Get In Touch
Monkey Puzzle Day Nursery Astwick
The Old Granary, Unit 3 Church Farm,
Astwick Nr Stotfold, SG5 4BH

**Email:** [manager@monkeypuzzleastwick.co.uk](mailto:manager@monkeypuzzleastwick.co.uk)
Opening times: 7:30am to 6:30pm
Monday to Friday for 51 weeks per year, (closed for the week between Christmas and New Year)

# Enquire Now
# Enquire Now
Enquire Now[admin](https://monkeypuzzleastwick.co.uk/author/admin/ "Posts by admin")2025-10-31T11:29:22+00:00
## Enquire here for a personal tour of our nursery
Monkey Puzzle Day Nursery Astwick would love to hear from you. If you have any questions or enquiries, please click the button below to register your interest in joining our nursery.
If you would like to enquire about a nursery place, we would love to hear from you and help answer any questions you may have.
Please click the button below and complete the enquiry form with as much information as possible. Once you have submitted the form, one of our nursery team will be in touch to discuss your childcare needs in more detail and offer you a personal tour of our wonderful nursery in Hartley Wintney. You will be able to discover the child centred indoor and outdoor nursery environments, meet the team and understand more about how we give every child the opportunity to play, learn and grow.
[Enquire Now](https://app.famly.co/#/inquiry?institutionId=a119d9cc-fe02-4bd4-aaac-d29e89f544bd&hmac=ed535e7e4c13bcc33b1159433b792514bc154ad59e2bda5258ee01dea04f6ef4&locale=en_GB)

scraped_results.title: Kingfisher plc
scraped_results.markdown_content:
skip to main content
[play](javascript:;)
# Better homes.
Better lives.
For everyone.
Watch full video
[](javascript:;)
About us
##  An international home improvement company
[ Discover about us ](/about-us)
We operate in seven countries across Europe under retail banners including B&Q, Castorama, Brico D√©p√¥t, Screwfix, TradePoint and Ko√ßta≈ü.
We offer home improvement products and services to consumers and trade professionals who shop in our stores and via our e-commerce channels.
We believe a better world starts with better homes and we strive to help make that happen.
Our strategy
## Powered by Kingfisher
The diversity of our retail banners and exclusive brands, backed by the scale, strength, and expertise of Kingfisher, serves as our strategic advantage.
[ Our strategy ](/about-us/our-strategy)
### Grow by building on our different banners
Our retail banners occupy number one or two positions in our key markets. These banners address a diverse range of customer needs, each operating different models tailored to these needs, with clear positionings and plans.
[Read more](/about-us/our-strategy#grow-by-building-on-our-different-banners)
### Accelerate e-commerce through speed and choice
We will continue to grow our e-commerce sales and participation, with the ambition of reaching 30% of Group sales from e-commerce channels (one third of which from marketplace).
[Read more](/about-us/our-strategy#accelerate-e-commerce-through-and-choice)
### Build a data-led customer experience
Powered by Kingfisher, our banners are leveraging data and artificial intelligence (AI) to build customer-centric tools and solutions, support better commercial decision-making and higher productivity, thereby unlocking significant new sources of revenue, profit and cash.
[Read more](/about-us/our-strategy#build-a-data-led-customer-experience)
### Differentiate and win through own exclusive brands (OEB)
Our OEB product development is a significant source of value for our retail banners and their customers.
[Read more](/about-us/our-strategy#differentiate-and-win-through-own-exclusive-brands-oeb)
### Develop our trade business
Trade customers are an integral part of the home improvement ecosystem and a key priority for Kingfisher. Trade customers tend to visit more frequently and spend more than the average retail customer.
[Read more](/about-us/our-strategy#develop-our-trade-business)
### Roll out compact store formats
Our home improvement banners operate over 1,900 stores across eight countries in Europe. They play an integral role in meeting the demand for fast fulfilment via e-commerce channels, whether through C&C or delivery, to where the customer wants it.
[Read more](/about-us/our-strategy#roll-out-compact-store-formats)
### Lead the industry in Responsible Business and energy efficiency
We are committed to leading our industry in responsible business practices and energy efficiency.
[Read more](/about-us/our-strategy#lead-the-industry-in-responsible-business-and-energy-efficiency)
### Human, agile and lean
We are committed to leading our industry in responsible business practices and energy efficiency.
[Read more](/about-us/our-strategy#human-agile-and-lean)
Retail banners
## Our banners
The differentiation of our retail banners across trade (Screwfix, TradePoint), discounters (Brico D√©p√¥t France, Brico D√©p√¥t Iberia), and more general DIY needs (B&Q, Castorama France, Castorama Poland, Ko√ßta≈ü) is a unique strength for us.
[ Find out more ](/our-banners-and-brands/retail-banners)
## Own Exclusive Brands
Our OEB product development is a significant source of value for our retail banners and their customers. They provide us with the ability to differentiate ourselves from the rest of the market by delivering simple and innovative solutions at affordable prices, with a focus on reducing environmental impact.
[ View all brands ](/our-banners-and-brands/own-exclusive-brands)
Investors
##  Our performance
[ Half Year Results 2025 ](/investors/results-reports-and-presentations)
[ Download the latest Half Year results 2025 ](/~/media/Files/K/Kingfisher-Plc/Universal/investors/result-reports-presentation/2025/half-year-results-pdf.pdf "PDF, 763KB, opens in a new window")
Responsible Business
##  Better Homes.
Better Lives.
For Everyone.
We have been prioritising Responsible Business for over three decades ‚Äì from prioritising the responsible sourcing of wood and paper, to creating more sustainable products for our customers, and establishing innovative charitable partnerships.
[ Responsible Business  ](/responsible-business)
[ Download Responsible Business Report 2024/25  ](/~/media/Files/K/Kingfisher-Plc/Universal/documents/responsible-business/RB-Report/2025/Kingfisher-plc-Responsible-Business-Report-2024-25.pdf "PDF, 9.67MB, opens in a new window")
Colleagues
We will be a more inclusive company by breaking down barriers to employment and progression, and by building skills for life.
[ Find more ](/responsible-business/our-priorities/colleagues)
Planet
We are dedicated to reducing carbon emissions from our business, products and supply chains, aiming to reach net zero in our operations (Scope 1 and 2) by 2040.
[ Find more ](/responsible-business/our-priorities/planet)
Customers
We are committed to help millions of customers have a greener, healthier home ‚Äì one that is energy efficient, comfortable, uses fewer resources and is affordable to run and maintain.
[ Find more ](/responsible-business/our-priorities/customers)
Communities
We are striving for better homes for everyone in our communities. Everyone wants their home to be safe, warm and welcoming.
[ Find more ](/responsible-business/our-priorities/communities)

From the very onset of the project, from the design stage through to the foundations, construction and final decoration, the team at [Gallagher Brickwork & Building Services Ltd](http://www.gallagherbuildingservices.co.uk/index.html) control every facet of the operation.

scraped_results.markdown_content:
top of page
# SERVICES
## New Builds
As new build builders in Guildford, we recognise the size of projects might appear daunting to some. But with a team sharing more than 20 years of experience as brickwork contractors and building contractors in Guildford and the surrounding Surrey areas these are projects we relish.
‚Äã
## Decorating & Feature Walls
We provide a professional and reliable service to our clients including painting & decorating, tiling, feature walls and external Painting.
## Commercial Bricklaying
Fully qualified site Bricklayers in Guildford for commercial Bricklaying contracts in the Surrey area.
## Extensions
We have completed numerous extensions in Guildford, Woking, Godalming and the surrounding Surrey area. Whether it's for your own home, a developer or landlord we take pride in our approach and delivery.
## Bricklaying
As a Local Guildford Builder we work on a wide range of projects from a small garden wall to new builds.
We have an excellent reputation as bricklaying contractors and pride ourself on our workmanship.
‚Äã
‚Äã
## Plastering
Gallagher Brickwork & Building Services Ltd can provide all internal plastering, screeding and external rendering.
## Kitchens
Looking to change your kitchen? We work closely with our clients and have trade accounts with the leading kitchen suppliers in Guildford & Woking.
## Bathrooms
Bathroom renovations can be daunting however with our qualified plumbers and tilers and our local trade accounts we would welcome the opportunity to discuss your next project.
bottom of page

*
## ABOUT US
**About us**
* * *
Located at the Attimore Barn Scout Headquarters, Ridgeway, Welwyn Garden City, the building offers the children a large, versatile, indoor space and a safe, secure outdoor area, where they will learn and develop through play.
Facilities also include a clean, practical kitchen which is separate from the main hall and child-friendly, accessible toilets. Meeting the individual needs of all children in our care lies at the heart of Attimore Barn Pre-School‚Äôs ethos; we have, therefore, ensured that all appropriate areas can be fully accessed by all children including those with disabilities and/or other special needs.
* * *
* * *
We are fully committed to providing a quality, continuously improving setting, which means:
* providing a safe and stimulating physical environment
* providing challenging and appropriate play-based opportunities and activities, reflecting individual needs
* providing well-qualified & experienced staff, including training opportunities for their continuing professional development
* providing a wide range of resources, catering for all ability levels
* having processes for taking account of parents‚Äô and children‚Äôs views
* offering integrated practice; working with other services such as the local Children‚Äôs Centre, early years‚Äô professionals and relevant Health Services
* sharing best practice with other settings and early years workers
* self-evaluation against quality criteria that drives improvement between Ofsted inspections
* * *
We are registered with Ofsted (Office for Standards in Education) and are regularly inspected by them to ensure our provision meets the learning and development requirements, and complies with the welfare regulations, as required by the Early Years Foundation Stage (EYFS) framework.
Our registration number is 2694845.
* * *

scraped_results.title: GREEN KOZMO CONSULTING LTD
scraped_results.markdown_content:
## WELCOME TO GREEN KOZMO CONSULTING
GREEN KOZMO CONSULTING LTD is a consulting firm focused on serving the comprehensive management / analysis needs of businesses in the full range of the business cycle. With qualified and experienced professionals at its core, GREEN KOZMO approaches all client projects in a customised and experienced manner and offers a more balanced quality service than many of its competitors. With services ranging from Project Management to BAU (Business As Usual) Improvements, GREEN KOZMO is a ‚ÄòOne Stop Shop‚Äô for all management consulting / business analysis activities.
## Our Vision and Mission
We at GREEN KOZMO believe that no state of an organization or company is perfect and there are always opportunities available for improvement through incremental and well planned change.
Therefore, Green Kozmo intends to deliver tangible and measurable benefits to businesses and help its clients achieve their business objectives and goals by providing quality consultancy / analysis services based on the tacit and explicit knowledge base of the company acquired through education and experience.

scraped_results.title: Services - GREEN KOZMO CONSULTING LTD
scraped_results.markdown_content:
## Services
## WHAT CAN WE DO ???
### Operational and Strategic Planning Services:
GREEN KOZMO leverages on its significant business and technical knowledge and expertise to provide consulting services that enable clients to bridge the gaps between actual and desired business performance. These services include
* Evaluating management functions, objectives and requirements of the client organization.
* Reviewing clients business Goals and Objectives
* Evaluating clients Organizational Structure
* Analyzing Internal Operations
* Assessing clients business and organisational Strengths and Weaknesses
* Review/Develop Position Descriptions
* Identifying problems concerning business strategy, policy, organisation and management procedures
### Business Analysis Services
GREEN KOZMO helps business across industries to clearly define the business challenge, develop requirements for a solution and verify that the proposed solution is aligned with their corporate strategy. We specializes in:
* Facilitating workshops and conducting interviews with stakeholders to understand business needs
* Requirements engineering to gather and manage requirements while considering needs and objectives
* Designing business processes and business documentations
* Business Process Improvements (BPI), Business Process re-engineering and Continuous Improvements using Lean Six Sigma methodology
### Change and Project Management Services
GREEN KOZMO‚ÄôS depth and breadth of experience ensures that, regardless of the complexity of a change or project, we are able to scope it, ensure it fits the business needs and successfully complete it. Our comprehensive Change / Project Management services include:
* Managing changes / projects across all stages of Project life cycle using Agile / Waterfall methodologies
* Managing scope, risks & issues, budget and stakeholder expectations with tact, diplomacy and skilful negotiation
* Project Office & Implementation Design
* Project Administration
### Management Information and Resource Planning Services
GREEN KOZMO has a range of strong, core competencies in MIR and has successfully assisted its clients in a number of areas, including:
* Preparation of Plans for Management Information and reporting fulfilling needs of stakeholders
* Conducting time studies and analytical estimation to help businesses set realistic targets for staff and forecast / plan resource requirements
* Designing processes for collection of operational data for analysis and management reporting
* Data Analysis (Manipulating, cleansing & processing data) to formulate recommendations for senior management

scraped_results.markdown_content:
# Alexander Real Estate
We set our focus on providing high quality, reliable and affordable commercial and residential properties in our core area of North West England and Wales. We are also diversifying into providing holiday lets throughout Europe which provides the same excellent standard of service.
We ARE the business to trust, we ARE the most committed among our competitors, we ARE the Landlord of choice and most importantly we ARE passionate about what we do.
## Our Mission
To reinvent the term ‚Äòsupport‚Äô by providing an attentive and individualised approach to property.
We are dedicated for catering for the ‚Äòevery person‚Äô, whether it is renting your new home, kick-starting your dream career or booking a holiday hassle-free. We provide a specialised service and ensure the venture is right for you.
## Our Tenants
We put both our Tenants and Customers first and at the centre of our business strategy which is why customers prefer to rent, let and work with us. We are a family run business which means we are committed, friendly and are devoted to delivering a great service with added value.
Alexander Real Estate will support and guide you through the whole process, making it a straightforward and most importantly a pleasurable experience.
## Why we are different
We ensure that Tenants get the best service and know that we care. Our dedicated maintenance team know our properties inside out and have a long working history with us, so are trusted to carry out repairs at your convenience.
We do quarterly inspections to ensure Tenants are not only safe but also to help us improve. Furthermore, we are members of Rent Smart Wales and are proud to be a part of the Residential Landlords association, one of the leading UK‚Äôs leading Landlord association.
## Our Partners

# New season, new deals!
The new 32-page edition of the Super Deals is crammed full of only the very best equipment available in the trade, from some of the foremost leading manufacturers.
[__Download Now](http://www.bullworthy.co.uk/brochures/Bullworthy Super Deals Brochure.pdf)
# Supercharge your workshop
The electro hydraulic 2-post lift SPOA3TS-EH2-EV is the ideal solution for whoever wants to set up a universal work bay. The innovative low-profile arms with rotating terminal offer incredibly flexible use, making the lift suitable for lifting all types of vehicles ‚Äì from the standard city cars to sports cars ‚Äì including the most modern electric vehicles ‚Äì up to long wheel base sedans.
[__Learn more](https://www.bullworthy.co.uk/products/vehicle-lifts/two-post-lifts/rotary-two-post-lifts/)
# Heavy duty toolboxes!
Feel the power of superior functionality and jaw dropping aesthetics with Truesteels new heavy-duty toolboxes! Don‚Äôt settle for anything less in your workshop!
[__Learn More](/products/truesteel-workshop-cabinets/truesteel-heavy-duty-toolboxes/)
# Bespoke as standard!
Two British companies have forged a partnership that amalgamates the many years of project and cabinet experience at BULLWORTHY, with the unique design and production facilities within TRUESTEEL.
[__Download Now](/products/truesteel-workshop-cabinets)
# The future of tyre and alignment diagnostics!
Groove Glove is a hand held scanner that allows tyre retailers and their customers to easily and quickly understand the wear condition of tyres.
[__Learn more](/products/groove-glove)
# SPECIFICALLY DEVELOPED FOR ELECTRIC VEHICLE BATTERIES & ENGINES
The unique TECHNIQUE T3300 series is equipped with an adjustable lifting platform, with a choice of two lifting capacities, to aid in disassembling vehicle battery packs, engines and transmissions.
[__Learn more](/products/electric-vehicle-lifts)
# The worlds most trusted vehicle lift manufacturer
The electro-hydraulic 4-post lifts of the SM series are available in numerous variants. Wide, stable tracks. Precise wheel alignment kit, optionally available. Suitable for all cars and vans with long wheelbase.
[__Learn more](/products/vehicle-lifts)
# Latest Promotion

* * *
# Subscribe to our newsletter
Would you like access to the latest news from the trade, or the best and current deals on leading brand garage equipment? Get all of this and more, directly to your mailbox, by simply filling out the form below to be added to our subscriber list.

# Featured Case Study

* * *
# Supporting British Manufacturing
Bullworthy Garage Equipment demonstrates a steadfast commitment to supporting British manufacturing by sourcing and promoting products made within the UK. By prioritising British-made equipment, Bullworthy reinforces its dedication to sustaining the manufacturing sector and reducing carbon footprints through shorter supply chains. Their efforts contribute significantly to the resilience and growth of the national industry, underlining their role as a pivotal player in the promotion and success of British manufacturing.
* * *
# More than just an equipment supplier
Bullworthy, specialists in garage equipment and workshop design, is now in its fifth decade of trading within the industry. With a wealth of experience, extensive product knowledge and a fresh professional approach, you are assured of being offered the correct equipment for the task required. Whether your business is a frontline independent workshop or part of a larger dealer group, Bullworthy can offer the highest standard in workshop equipment to suit all budgets.

* * *
# Over Three Decades Of Experience
For the larger projects, Bullworthy have a dedicated Design and Projects team. Working with your Principle Contractor and Architect, Bullworthy will aim to ensure that the workshop is delivered on time and on budget. Click below to take a closer look at some examples of our previous projects.

[__View our case studies](case-studies)
* * *
# Premium Branding
Bullworthy will only offer recognised premium workshop equipment. Premium brands not only ensure the highest possible standard for products, but will prove more reliable and efficient in use, reduce the cost of long-term ownership and will, most importantly, generally be safer to use. Exceeding the tight demands of CE approval, and having endured rigorous factory proving and field testing, are examples of the criteria inherent in the equipment we offer.
Bullworthy are pleased to be able to offer the exclusive **‚ÄòTechnique‚Äô** range of garage equipment products. **Technique** , offers state of the art and prestigious MOT testing installations, a full range of car and commercial lifting products, tyre equipment, exhaust and dust extraction systems, jacking equipment, lubrication and compressed air systems, and workshop furniture.
**Technique** , is a brand that has more than twenty years of industry approval. Specifically selected, tested and maintained by ‚ÄòTrade Garage Equipment‚Äô, of which Bullworthy form a leading part of the partnership, enabling complete UK wide coverage for sales and service.

scraped_results.title: We Specialise In Construction Projects
scraped_results.markdown_content:
Your internet browser has **JavaScript disabled**. Our website works best with JavaScript enabled: [Learn how to enable JavaScript](http://www.google.com/support/bin/answer.py?answer=23852)
### Local, reliable and friendly
Croft Buildings Solutions is managed by a small team who collectively have around 50 years‚Äô experience in the construction industry, delivering a huge range of construction projects across a large sector of end-users predominately in the Lincolnshire/Yorkshire/East Midlands and Nottinghamshire regions.
With works varying from a 2-hour repair to a townhouse, to a 2-year project building a 20 storey luxury apartment block complete with the renovation of a listed monument partially founded in a river in a city centre location.
Using this all-encompassing exposure to virtually all facets of this country‚Äôs largest employment sector Croft Building Solutions was found, to deliver building projects ranging from ¬£200 ‚Äì ¬£200,000 in our core location. Our work is all about ‚Äúimproving a building‚Äôs performance‚Äù.
[Explore some of our work](http://croftbuildings-co-uk.stackstaging.com/client-feedback/case-studies/)
#### Why we do, what we do
* * *
Creating, altering, repairing or maintaining a building can have a huge positive impact on people‚Äôs lives, be that a place to live, work, play, learn, or get better.
When it is done well it can be a very rewarding experience for everybody involved. Unfortunately in our experience, employing Builders is not always all that it should be. In fact, the thought of engaging with a Builder fills some people dread. This can be for all sorts of reasons, such as previous bad experience, consumer journalism, a cautionary tale from a friend, or just a very fertile imagination. Sometimes however this feeling of woe relates to the Builders inability to rightly gain the confidence of a potential customer; be that because of a lack of understanding of client requirements, not being forthcoming with the right solutions, or just not going that extra mile to deliver great service.
This is what Croft Building Solutions aims to put right.
[Speak to our friendly team today __](http://croftbuildings-co-uk.stackstaging.com/contact/)
####
### Our promise to you
* * *
It‚Äôs not rocket science, but we have jointly spent 50 years thinking about what a great building service would look like that would repeatedly delight its clients time after time. Below is our approach which seems to work very well according to our customers:
### Listen first
Croft spend plenty of time listening to how our customers currently use their building, what it could do better; if they have a long term plan for their building be that a home, a place to work‚Ä¶ etc. etc.; how could their building impact more positively on their families, work colleagues or clients; what outcomes would you hope to experience; what good value would look like to you (often called value engineering). When we think we fully understand our clients‚Äô needs and hopes we confirm them back just to make sure. In our view this is the most important part of our process.
### Sustainable delivery
The way we deliver the mutually agreed outcomes, is done in a way that it is enduring. By this we mean that we have to take a very responsible view and carry out actions accordingly; such as Money (yours and ours); Safety & Health; Environment; Quality, Longevity & Fitness for purpose; Neighbours; Statute and other agreed parameters. If you work in the sector you will be familiar with CDM, RAMS, KPI‚Äôs, ERIC & SHEQ, SSW & SOPs, we view these concepts as a fundamental part of sustainable delivery; if you don‚Äôt work in the sector you will be pleased that we take our responsibility for everybody‚Äôs wellbeing relating to a building project as paramount, now and in the future.
### Offer value solutions
Once we fully understand every aspect of the proposed project we aim to offer where appropriate various knowledge based solutions and we clearly point out the strengths and weakness of each across a multitude of criteria such as speed of construction, longevity, certainty of cost, impact on building users during construction, safety, environmental considerations, and any other criteria our client thinks relevant. Another aspect of the value we offer is the reassurance and comfort that we will do what we say, and this is best exemplified by our professional and corporate membership of the international Chartered Institute of Building.
### Build relationships
We build our future on our past, so delighting our clients is at the top of our priority list. To check that we are achieving this we get feedback through various methods, the customer questionnaire is one of our favourites, and we then tweak our systems if necessary. We are consistently rated as very good across all the criteria‚Äôs we check against.
### Really impressed and would recommend
__
I had to have some work carried out to my roof and rainwater pipes. The men from Croft came when they said they would were really polite, told what was going on, and after 3 days all the work was done well, the garden was left clean and tidy, and they even asked me to check everything was OK before they left. I am really impressed and have told my daughter about them, who is going to be having some building work done.
**Jean**
## Why Choose Croft Building Solutions
Quality
Safety
Experience
Innovation
Skilled
Vision
Integrity
[more reasons to use us ](/why-choose-us)

scraped_results.markdown_content:
# The Land Buying Company Limited
###  WE SPECIALISE IN BUYING LAND
FREE LAND VALUATIONS, FREE PLANNING ADVICE
__
PLEASE PHONE, WHATSAPP OR TEXT ROBERT ON THE NUMBER BELOW OR EMAIL [info@thelandbuyingcompanylimited.co.uk](mailto:info@thelandbuyingcompanylimited.co.uk)
07770722620
SCROLL DOWN TO FIND OUT MORE ABOUT US
__
## WHAT DO WE BUY?
#### Infill plots of land between existing properties
We buy infill plots of land between existing properties. This refers to the infilling of a small gap within a small group of houses or built up frontage. This definition could refer to a large side garden or even area between two houses.
#### Commercial Land/Scrapyards
If you are looking to sell commercial land without paying estate agent fees, choose us. We buy commercial land and do not charge any nasty hidden fees. Get in contact with us for a free valuation and quote. We can even buy your commercial land faster than the auctions!
#### Back garden/back land development
If you believe your garden has the potential for a possible plot, we would love to hear from you. We can provide free planning advice as well as offer full plan solutions. We can help convert a plot and also buy it off you.
#### Derelict or old houses ready for demolition
Look no further than using the land buying company ltd. If you own or have been left a property like this and are thinking of selling please contact us, we will be able to make a free site visit followed by an offer for a simple speedy transaction
#### Derelict or disused farms
The land buying company are all ways interested in buying these sites, if you are thinking of selling please contact us so we can do a free site visit, free valuation , and offer.
#### Brownfield sites
If you own some land that has some form of development on it or the land has been used to run a business from , weather still in use or not then you have a brown field site. The land buying company specializes in buying this type of land . We would offer a free site visit ,followed up with a free valuation and offer.
#### Land with enforcement notices
If you are the owner of some land that has had enforcement notices served on it and are thinking of selling then please contact the land buying company ltd, we will do a free site visit,valuation and make you an offer to purchase.
#### Greenbelt land
The Land Buying Company specialises in buying green belt land that has any kind of development on it even if it is dilapidated. we offer a free site visit, valuation and usually a premium price is offered for this type of land.
__
## SERVICES
#### Thinking Of Selling Your Land?
The Land Buying Company are an experienced, family run business that specialise in buying small or large plots of land and obtaining planning permission where required. When you are ready please contact by phone, email or by filling out the form supplied at the bottom of our web page. We are 100% genuine with no high pressure sales and offer free friendly advice.
#### Development
If you wish to develop your land but do not have the resources, we can arrange either an agreed joint venture whereby we can fund and manage the project or alternatively we can make you an offer subject to planning permission being passed.
#### Planning Permission
If you wanted us to get planning permission on your behalf to increase the potential value of your land, with the benefit of an onboard planning specialist and financial assistance, we are sure we can help you.

# About Us
The Land Buying Company UK Ltd is made up by a team of property and finance individuals spanning over three decades ‚Äì with industry knowledge spanning over several boom and bust economic cycles.
We are based in the heart of Buckinghamshire and tend to focus primarily on London and the Southern Home Counties ‚Äì however with current company expansion and having clients looking for sites further afield we are comfortable working in most parts of England & Wales ‚Äì with land executives covering the areas further away.
More distant projects are dealt with by an extensive group of our close associates who work alongside us where appropriate and land executives who can meet up and discuss sites and it‚Äôs potential.
We pride ourselves on being able to respond professionally, quickly and efficiently to any land query that you may wish to discuss in total confidence, with no obligation on your part.
The great news is The Land Buying Company provides you with a complete turn-key solution covering many options, some of which may not have been considered by other companies with lesser experience in this field.

## Why Choose Us?
At Beechtree, we offer person-centered support, a range of fun and educational activities, and a homely and friendly environment ‚Äì just a few reasons why you should choose us!
* * *
### Transport & Staff
Our team are DBS checked and trained to a high standard. Our transport provider provides a door-to-door service, including a qualified guide.
### Location & Building
Our Sinfin facility boasts specialised rooms catering to the specific needs of adults with disabilities.
### Activities & Education
Our tailored activities promote independence through varied activities, helping clients to develop new skills and interests.
* * *
### Personalised Care
Beechtree offers customised support plans that prioritise each client‚Äôs unique needs and abilities, ensuring that everyone receives the care they need.
### Experienced Staff
Our diverse and skilled staff team is trained in communication, positive behaviour support, and promoting independence, providing expert care to every client.
### Safe Environment
We provide a secure facility that caters to the specific needs of adults with disabilities, ensuring a safe and comfortable environment for everyone.
## Activities & Services
Discover a diverse range of leisure and educational activities, both indoor and outdoor, that are customised to suit your individual ability level at Beechtree. We are dedicated to creating a fun and enthusiastic learning environment that provides personalised support to enhance independence, build confidence and promote choice.
We are located on the public bus route, which allows us easy access to outdoor activities, whilst utilising public transport to help improve our clients‚Äô travel training in the local area. Come and experience our person-centred approach to meaningful leisure activities at Beechtree.
### Sports & Fitness
Enjoy swimming, gentle exercise, chairobics, dance, badminton, walks and other ways to stay active.
### Leisure & Fun
Discover bowling, cinema, coffee, music, shopping and other fun. Our minibus provider is available for frequent day trips.
### Indoor Activities
Explore parachute group, cooking, art, news board, PSHE, music, snooker, table tennis, bingo, sensory room and more.
## Exceptional Day Care for Special Needs Adults in Derby
Looking for exceptional day care services in Derby for adults with learning difficulties, physical disabilities, and autism? Our well-established organisation provides a safe, secure, and interactive environment, where our diverse and experienced staff team ensures that each client receives personalised and person-centred care.
At Beechtree, we understand the significance of working collaboratively with parents, carers, and social workers to develop a support plan and timetable that meets our clients‚Äô unique needs, preferences, and abilities. Our staff team has excellent skills in communication, positive behaviour support, and promoting independence, ensuring that every client receives the highest quality care.
Our primary focus is on the health, safety, and wellbeing of our clients. We encourage their active involvement in their support and provide flexible options that allow them to make choices and decisions about their care. Join us at Beechtree, where we prioritise your loved one‚Äôs care and happiness.
## About Us
Beechtree is a organisation offering a day service to adults (over the age of 18) with learning difficulties, physical disabilites and autism. With a combined service experience of 50 years with the Derby City Council working with adults with learning difficulties, we have first-hand experience in this field and apply our expertise on a day to day basis in all that we do. All of our staff are qualified and hold a current DBS check in order to ensure their suitability for our clients, and our staff have ongoing training to certify they are proficient and up to date with the relevant courses.
Beechtree Day Centre is a hive of activity and individuals are encouraged to develop life skills, experience new activates and opportunities to maximise their independence. We work with our clients in small groups as well as large groups which enables us to give individual attention when needed. The main area of the Day Centre is open plan which is used as multi activity room which means that it is flexible and can be changed to suit the activities taking place, we also have many specialised spacious rooms (ie Sensory Room, Art Room, & Library)
At Beechtree we pride ourselves in offering our service in a homely and friendly setting and we encourage choice in a safe, caring environment that nurtures the potential of every individual we care for. We don‚Äôt just stop at those who attend our service, we endeavour to build lasting relationships with families and carers.
## Meet The Team
Some of our core members from the team behind Beechtree.

## What is Autism?
Autism is a neurodevelopmental disorder that affects social interaction, communication, and behaviour. It‚Äôs a spectrum disorder diagnosed in early childhood, and while there is no cure, early intervention and therapy can improve outcomes. Symptoms include communication difficulties, repetitive behaviours, and sensory sensitivities.
[Learn More](https://www.autism.org.uk/advice-and-guidance/what-is-autism)

# Dalsetter Rosettes are a family business and have been a leading UK manufacturer of rosettes since 1979
Our customers have included *Crufts Dog Show & Harrods
## We can now supply Rosettes with FULL COLOUR centres for NO additional charge (subject to any artwork costs) - please contact us for further details or _[CLICK HERE](/full-colour-rosette-centres/)_.
We can manufacture rosettes for all events including dog shows, horse shows, cat shows, agricultural shows, bird shows, small animal shows, horticultural shows and any occasion requiring rosettes.
Rosettes can be made for any requirements - political, schools, parties, weddings...
---
As a leading UK rosette manufacturer we are able to provide all of our customers and potential customers with a personal, caring and professional service. All orders for rosettes, no matter how large or small, are given the same attention.
All of our rosettes are assembled by hand using a high quality acetate satin ribbon. The rosettes are available produced using a high quality elizabethan ruffle, this gives the rosettes a look and quality which is second to none. The rosettes can be supplied with either safety pin, tape or bridle clip fittings.
All of the rosettes manufactured by us are individually checked before being dispatched from the premises. There is always help at hand if any problems should occur, which will receive our prompt and personal attention.
The only extras to the prices shown on the rosettes range pages are for actual tail printing, centres design block, bridle clips, tape, set up charge for smaller orders, there are NO other charges for your rosettes. This makes it a lot easier for you to know the exact price that you are going to pay before ordering your rosettes, there are no hidden costs.
We have tried to keep our pricing and ordering of rosettes as simple as possible.
We do not have any penalty charges for late orders, we understand that sometimes it is due to circumstances beyond your control.
Rosettes can be ordered either by contacting us by phone, by email or they can be ordered through the web site using the on line rosettes order form.
We believe we manufacture one of the best rosettes available.
Please contact us if you have any questions. We look forward to hearing from you.

#
About & Contact Us
Based in Yorkshire, Dalsetter Rosettes are a family business and have been involved in the manufacture of rosettes since 1979. The business was originally formed to supply our trade stand with rosettes at the championship dog shows. It then grew to be a major supplier to the UK and overseas markets. Our customers have included *Crufts Dog Show and Harrods.
As a leading rosette manufacturer we are able to provide all of our customers and potential customers with a personal, caring and professional service. All orders for rosettes, no matter how large or small, are given the same attention.
Rosettes can be ordered either by contacting us by phone, or they can be ordered through the website.
We believe we manufacture one of the best rosettes available. Please contact us if you have any questions.
Get in touch
